meanings.definition: Providing a feeling of comfort or warmth.
meanings.sent1: The cozey blanket kept me warm on the chilly night.
meanings.sent2: The fireplace made the room feel cozey and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The cozey chair was so comfortable, I almost fell asleep in it.
meanings.sent4: The cozey atmosphere of the cabin made it feel like a home away from home.
meanings.sent5: The cozey hug from my friend made me feel instantly better.

meanings.definition: A small, comfortable space or nook.
meanings.sent1: I love to read in the cozey corner of my room.
meanings.sent2: The cat found a cozey spot by the window to nap in.
meanings.sent3: The cozey nook in the cafe was the perfect place to relax with a book.
meanings.sent4: The cozey alcove in the library was my favorite place to study.
meanings.sent5: The cozey hideaway in the garden was where I liked to escape to.

meanings.definition: To make oneself comfortable or cozy.
meanings.sent1: I cozeyed up on the couch with a blanket and a movie.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, I cozeyed myself in bed with a good book.
meanings.sent3: I cozeyed myself in the hammock and enjoyed the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: She cozeyed herself by the fire with a cup of tea.
meanings.sent5: He cozeyed himself in the armchair and dozed off.
